column2: You don’t understand. I had to do it. Do you know how many people I’m responsible for? I couldn’t let this company fail, I couldn’t let my employees lose everything because of my mistakes.
Relax, I’m just here to do an audit. Hand over your tax information. Everything will be fine… unless you haven’t been paying your taxes.
Oh… Really? Of course I pay my taxes, I’ll have my assistant get you the documents you need.
Actually sir, you haven’t been the same since gaining magical powers. You’ve been acting irrational.
You… haven’t been paying your taxes.
So it is true. I’m afraid I have to arrest you.
No, I won’t let this happen! You’ll never take me alive! Assistant, kill him!
